synopsis.text:
Jun-ho and Nam-woo, two inseparable childhood friends, navigate the trials and tribulations of growing up in a quaint fishing village teetering on the brink of change. Nam-woo, having lost his father, finds solace in the company of his beloved cat, Yo, and his best friend Jun-ho. One fateful day, the boys stumble upon an enigmatic marble near an abandoned lighthouse, which unexpectedly transports Nam-woo and Yo to a fantastical realm filled with vibrant flora and floating islands.

In this dreamlike world, they encounter Mari, a captivating girl with the ability to soar through the skies on the back of a colossal dog. As Nam-woo and Jun-ho continue to traverse between reality and this mesmerizing alternate universe, they must face the challenges that come with change and the heart-wrenching complexities of life. When a storm befalls their village and tragedy strikes, the boys are forced to confront the harsh realities of growing up while cherishing the enchanting memories of their time spent with Mari.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
